summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of FlipCut Lunar UI redesign. All 15 specified features tested successfully across desktop, mobile, and tablet viewports. Black/white color scheme implemented perfectly, Uplane thank you modal works flawlessly with team images and personalized messages, magnetic text effects and scroll animations function correctly, and all navigation elements are responsive and accessible.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with pure black/white color scheme (RGB 0,0,0 confirmed)
For Uplane button in navbar opens thank you modal successfully
Thank you modal displays Uplane team image correctly
Modal contains personalized messages for Mr. Marvin, Mr. Julius, and Mr. Lukas
Portfolio link button in modal works with correct href
Magnetic text effect on headline functions on hover
Scroll reveal animations trigger correctly during page scroll
Spotlight cards have proper hover effects with visual feedback
Start Creating button is enabled and clickable for auth
Learn More button successfully scrolls to features section
Features section displays exactly 6 feature cards as expected
How it works section shows 3 steps with proper numbering
CTA section at bottom has working call-to-action button
Footer contains portfolio link with correct URL
Sign in button is enabled and accessible
Mobile responsiveness works across all components
Modal functionality works on mobile devices
All interactive elements are accessible on mobile
